attributes.action: more to be done legally to protect our environment against plastic pollution
attributes.background: As we all know global plastic pollution is a high contender in the destruction of living things and enviroments. We want more to be done by the UK government to play our part to secure a win on the war on plastics.

rejection.details:
We understand that you are concerned about plastic pollution but we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

There are a lot of open petitions calling on the Government to ban specific types of plastic. You might want to sign one or more of those. For example, this petition calls on the Government to ban unsustainable food packaging:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232684

You could also start a new petition setting out clearly the specific action you would like taken.
